H0.text: Who wrote The Importance Of Being Earnest. George Bernard Shaw

H1.text: Who wrote The Importance Of Being Earnest. Jane Austen

H2.text: Who wrote The Importance Of Being Earnest. Charles Dickens

H3.text: Who wrote The Importance Of Being Earnest. O Wilde

A4.text: During rehearsal Alexander requested that Wilde shorten the play from four acts to three, which the author did.

A5.text: The Importance of Being Earnest remains his most popular play.
